description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Moroccan Sweet Potato Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato
name: Spiced Moroccan Sweet Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g orange sweet potato, peeled, coarsely chopped (see tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over high heat. Cook garlic and onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add cumin, coriander and 1 tsp of the paprika. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add potato, half of the chickpeas and 1 litre of water and bring to the boil. Simmer, uncovered, for 15-20 minutes or until potato is tender.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 220Â°C. Place pepitas and remaining chickpeas on a baking paper-lined tray. Sprinkle with remaining paprika. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Combine yoghurt and lime juice in a bowl.
Using a stick blender, process soup until smooth. Serve topped with lime yoghurt, baked chickpeas, pepitas and coriander.
